name: Sia-UI-beta
author: NebulousLabs
description: A UI application for interfacing with Sia

scripts.clean: rm -rf release doc/Sia-UI node_modules app/Sia app/config.json **/*.swp npm-debug.log
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm start
scripts.sia-kill: killall siad; while pgrep siad; do sleep .5; done;
scripts.sia-reimport: npm run sia-repo && npm run sia-kill && npm run sia-import
